about_the_game:
Join QQ chat group for Roam Across: 772400787
欢迎加入行地无疆官方QQ反馈交流讨论群：772400787
AVAILABLE NOW!
反向跳票！比原定发售日提前一周，《行地无疆》已正式上线！

《行地无疆》是一款聚焦于东汉末年，草原与中原的回合制角色扮演游戏。出色的主线剧情不含任何解谜和重复跑腿的任务。几个较大型支线被整合进了主线剧情中，不必担心错过精彩环节。此外，丰富且多样的武器、装备、坐骑与招式，让您可以依据自己喜爱的游玩风格自由选择玩法。若您偏爱探索，全部连通的主要场景更能让您自由驰骋，也许会在不经意间发现隐藏的小支线或彩蛋，并收获丰厚的回报。相信《行地无疆》一定能给您带来独特且出色的游戏体验。

欢迎加入行地无疆官方QQ反馈交流讨论群：772400787。您的任何反馈、意见和建议，都请畅所欲言！
如果对《行地无疆》还满意，请您不吝给予好评，不胜感激！

As civil war rages in the south, even the emperor kneels before the mighty warlords. The once-unified Han Empire teeters on the brink of division, and the era of the Three Kingdoms looms. Amidst this turmoil, the young master faces a daunting task—ensuring the safety and prosperity of his tribesmen on the vast prairie. In this turn-based RPG, the fate of the tribes rests on your strategic prowess and leadership.

Classic Turn-Based Role-Playing Game


Know Your Path to Victory:
Understanding the enemy's strengths and playing to your own advantages is often more potent than relentless assaults. Yet, when our forces stand unyielding, the power of aggression remains the simplest, most effective strategy. Remember, speed is of the essence in warfare, and the destrutive power smashes everything.

Equip for Triumph


An array of diverse equipment, from helmets to mounts, enriches your adventure. Choosing the right mount is paramount—swift horses can turn the tide of battle and transform defeat into victory. As you journey, will you wear an amulet to sharpen your instincts or don armor to safeguard against the unexpected? In the face of conflict, do you ride lightly to strike swiftly or clad in armor to weather arrows? The choice rests with you.

Unleash Powerful Skills and Abilities


Weapon Mastery:
Each weapon harbors unique strengths—long spears can swing and thrust, while short bows allow rapid fire and strong bows deliver a decisive blow. Exploit weapon attributes to your advantage. Gallop into the fray to shatter enemy lines when lightly armed, or let loose a storm of arrows when atop a charging horse. Seek guidance from mentors, forge alliances, observe the world's myriad facets, or wield legendary artifacts to unleash an array of skills. Harness elemental powers or stoke battle fervor for triumphant combat.

Collect and Utilize a Range of Items


Sustain for Victory:
Beyond the bounty of nature—honey, wild fruits, and mushrooms—lies a spectrum of provisions: potions, jerky, cheese, and savory feasts, crowned by rare, exquisite wines. Heal the body and mind, strengthen your resolve, or enhance physical prowess to emerge victorious in battle.

Experience Linear Storytelling with Exploration


Unfold Your Story:
While the narrative unfurls linearly, explore territories under your rule at will. Regular visits to cherished places and dear friends may offer insight and connections. Will you Roam Across the land on foot or journey by station wagon to save some foot? The decision is yours.
Focus on engaging storytelling and gameplay—puzzles are absent, and repetitive side quests are non-existent.

Save Your Progress Any Time You Want!


Take notes on your parchments is a prudent habit. Clear springs in the woods or mansion beds revitalize you. At such moments, take a note! Or keep the parchments closed and never take any note—the power to choose lies with you.

Easter Eggs!


Unearth Secrets:
Within the vast world of Roam Across, you'll discover meticulously crafted Easter eggs, awaiting your chance encounter. Some will even unveil more secrets after your initial discovery. Marching with full attention,or leisurely stroll and savor the fragrance of roses? All decisions are yours.

Welcome to join QQ chat group for Roam Across：772400787
AVAILABLE NOW! A week earlier than schedule！

  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM

short_description: Civil war continues down south, even the emperor bows to the mighty warlords. Han Empire will soon divide into THREE KINGDOMS. What should the young master do to keep his tribesmen on prairie safe and sound? Everything is in the turn-based RPG: Roam Across.
